resources.string: Click on the button for the combination of sites you would like to search:
Signup with Invite Code: FAITHPIE333 and get a $5 bonus

This app allows you to choose which shopping sites you would like to explore in one search. This saves you time by no longer needing to search each site individually. There\'s a button to take you to a bonus screen in the app so you can get exclusive deals to join these shopping sites. If you\'re not interested in ever searching "all sites", you may disable this button via the Preferences button.
If the search engines do NOT default to images, you can click the Images tab at the top of the results page
